divs: Sighting DetailsAt first I thought it was a bright star south east. after smoking my cig it started to wobbel and the colors dimmed out,then back up again. I had a full view no obstructions.After about 14 minutes a smaller light appared from the bottom and moved away toward the north to milwaukee. it traveled at a very fast rate and then went out of view. the star looking craft is still outside and has not moved except for zigzagging and changing altitude. is has went nearly dim but it seems to be waiting for the smaller light to return maybe i dont know.Just checked and my sister is watching it with me trying to get my camcorder to film it.it is bobbing up and down still and seems to be rotating colors around it. waiting for the smaller craft if it does come back.
Summary: Appeared as a bright star then it started wobbling
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Burlington
There were no other sightings in Burlington on or around December 5th 2010
